games.title: Brass: Birmingham
games.description: Build networks, grow industries, and navigate the world of the Industrial Revolution.
comments: Slightly inferior to the original (Lancashire), although such a distinction is worthy of note and little more. The game offers some extra dimensions and enjoys more popularity. Would happily play it with no complaint if no one is up for its sibling.
Stunning. Very easy to learn!
Nice theme, nice components, amazing mechanics. I love the decisions, I love the preplanning, I love building up to final scoring. Some rules might be missed on first games though.

1 play in. It is a good mix of mechanisms and highly indirectly interactive. Can go in with a rough strategy in mind but I find it difficult to plan more than a few moves in advance because the board state changes quite fast. Does provide options to pivot, however.

An excellent strategy game which has an interesting network and economy between players. There's a little bit of fiddliness with the cards and the turn order, but  I love the feel and game arc of this game.

Played once. Looong game.
Only for core gamers
Yea, it's good. Tough to grok, but really not that hard to play so make the effort and give this a whirl -- you almost assuredly will be glad you did.

games.title: Pandemic Legacy: Season 1
games.description: Mutating diseases are spreading around the world - can your team save humanity?
comments: This is the 1st legacy game I bought and played. I rated this game 9 after a few plays, but it goes down for me with each play. Every month feels almost the same and gathering a set of cards is not a mechanic which me and my friends are fans of. It is still much better than regular Pandemic.
Finished playthrough - can serve as basic pandemic
All the fun of Pandemic plus a narrative that takes place over 12-24 play sessions, AND characters and a board that develop along with the story? Yes, please!
Definitely one of my favorite games of all time - my favorite medium weight 2 player game
Played with wife during the pandemic. Such a cool experience!
Great game with a great thematic story line added in? yes please.
One of the best gaming experiences I've had since joining this hobby.
This game is a monster! Wonderful experience!

games.title: Twilight Imperium: Fourth Edition

comments: Had a truly great time playing this game. I was put off by the notorious play time, that being said we played 6 players and all in all i think it was wrapped up 9 hours, with 2 of those being faffing about with set up.

(3, 6) #players

140 €
